titleStmt.title: An answer to the Bishop of Rochester's first letter to the Earl of Dorset, &c. concerning the late ecclesiastical commission by an Englishman.
titleStmt.author: Englishman.
Charlton, Mr.
Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713. Letter from the Bishop of Rochester to ... the Earl of Dorset and Middlesex.

notesStmt.note: Possibly by Mr. Charlton. Cf. Á Wood, A. Athenæ oxonienses, 1813-1820, v. 4, col. 730.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
